DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the rate of complete pathological response after 3 cycles of gemcitabine containing chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Trial of Gemcitabine Containing Regimens As Preoperative Chemotherapy in Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed non small cell lung cancer No prior chemotherapy or radiation for non small cell lung cancer No prior malignancy Pregnancy or breastfeeding Serious concomitant disorders
